org.jetel.util

Class TargetFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.TargetFile

  • public class TargetFile
extends java.lang.Object
    TargetFile is used for basic operation over output files or streams and formatter. It support methods for multifile record.

      • setFileTag

        public void setFileTag(java.lang.Object fileTag)
        FileURL can contains '#' mark, the string of marks is replaced the fileTag. If a file tag is Number, there is used NumberFormat for definition of minimal lenght of the fileTag. Ie: ## and 5 is "05".
        Parameters:
        fileTag -
